definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: only du. (Schulth:ZAW xxii (1902), 164) face (BH [[אַף]], √ [[אנף]]; Aram. of Têma [[אנפי]] SAC:23 Lzb:222 Cooke:69:1, 14, so S-C:G 19 and (usu.) Targum:J; [[אפין]] Targum:Onk Jon, 0apeyn Syr. Chr-Pal. (Schulth:Lex.13); also [[אפי]] Palm. Lzb:222 Cooke:p.339, Chr-Pal. c. prep. lpy Schulth:Lex.14, etc.);—pl. sf. 3 ms. [[אַנְפּוֹהִי]] Da 2:46, Da 3:19.
